Posts.Content: Hi,  i have invasive ductal breast cancer, it’s grade three and triple negative. Was diagnosed last Thursday and that was less than three weeks from myself finding lump.  I’m 43 and live in Devon with my amazing husband and three children. I now have a treatment plan in place, a start date for chemo and have had a clip put in lump and bone scan with a ct scan next Thursday. I’m still in shock, my whole family and friends are shocked too, we’ve not had a family member with cancer so this is new to all of us. I just wanted to say Hi to you all, I came across this group chat whilst waiting for my biopsy results, it’s been a great help so far, have a lovely weekend  L xx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed last week
